name: gaming-rewards-protocol

scripts.build: npm run build:core && npm run build:contracts && npm run build:validation && npm run build:interface

scripts.security:static: npm run lint && npm run type-check
scripts.lint: npm run lint:core && npm run lint:contracts && npm run lint:validation && npm run lint:interface
